snippet: CES, the consumer electronics show held last week in Las Vegas, featured a number of apps, including a new entrant in the live streaming category.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column highlights standout apps from International Consumer Electronics Show.
lead_paragraph: CES, the consumer electronics show held last week in Las Vegas, featured a number of apps, including a new entrant in the live streaming category.

headline.print_headline: Standouts From This Year’s International CES
headline.main: Video Feature: Some Standouts at the International CES
